content:
## Timeblocks

### v1

```plain text
8:00 | Wake up
8:00 - 8:10   | Brush Teeth
8:10 - 8:20   | Block GitHub, experiment with GitHub CLI
8:20 - 9:00   | Completing overdue tasks
9:00 - 12:00  | Polishing up AdminControl
12:00 - 21:30 | Making major adjustments and updates to `lionconfig` (yes, somehow this actually took me the whole day)
21:30 - 22:00 | 
```

## Routines

### Morning Routine

```plain text
7:00        | Wake Up
7:00 - 7:15 | Brush Teeth, Make Bed, Place Kindle on Pillow
7:15 - 7:30 | Breakfast
```

### Evening Routine

```plain text
22:00 - 22:30 | Check email; Clear voice memos; Create timeblock for next day; Clear desk; Plug in devices
22:30 - 22:45 | Brush teeth; Quick shower
22:45 - 23:15 | Reading
23:15         | Bedtime; experiment with playing Weightless
```
